wikipedia_page.main: Ian Lister (5 September 1946 – 8 February 2013) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a winger.

response: The 1968 Scottish Cup Final was played on 27 April 1968 at Hampden Park in Glasgow and was the final of the 83rd staging of the Scottish Cup. Dunfermline Athletic and Hearts contested the match. Dunfermline Athletic won the match 3–1 with goals from two goals from Pat Gardner and a goal from Ian Lister, Hearts got on the scoresheet through a John Lunn own goal.
* 8 February: Ian Lister, 65, Aberdeen, Dunfermline Athletic, Raith Rovers, St Mirren and Berwick Rangers winger.
*Ian Lister, 66, Scottish footballer (Aberdeen, Dunfermline Athletic).Ian Lister (1948-2013)
